Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Requiem of Spirit#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
